caller_intent: Sandra Haymore wants to make a payment for her automobile insurance policy, specifically the monthly installment.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the policy type (automobile) and policyholders (Sandra and Wilson).
Agent informed the caller about a $4 payment processing fee.
Agent collected credit card details (Visa ending in 4564, expiration 12/25, CVV 981, zip code 27043).
Agent processed the payment for $354 (monthly installment).
Agent sent confirmation email to the provided email address (297314).
knowledge_required: Payment processing procedures including fee disclosure
Credit card verification and security protocols
summary: Sandra Haymore contacted Alliance Insurance to make a monthly auto insurance payment. The agent processed the $354 payment via Visa, informed her about the $4 fee, and sent a confirmation email. The call concluded with the customer confirming she had the email on hand and no further assistance was needed.
